name: Baby-Doll Eyes
summary: This move has a priority of +1 and lowers the target's Attack.
viability: Stat-lowering moves aren't really recommended due to the fact that the target can just switch out. That said, it can be useful against a Swords Dance, Hone Claws, Coil, or Dragon Dance user. The increased priority should help a lot with controlling a sweeper. It's not going to be anyone's first choIce for a move slot, but it has a certain purpose.
